akas: Michael's Amazing Soap Trivia Challenge (working title)
akas from release info: Michael's Amazing Soap Trivia Challenge (working title)
imdb.plot outline: After ending his run on Guiding Light, Emmy nominee Michael O'Leary is headed back to TV in the role of a lifetime - as himself. He's hosting the game show "Michael's Amazing Soap Trivia Challenge" that features his beautiful wife Dilly as his hostess. Taking place on his front porch, three contestants answer challenging question all in their quest to be crowned as SOAP TRIVIA GURU.
imdb.title: Home Again, Home Again
plot: After discovering he has a son from a one night stand, former national news weather man returns to his small home town in Minnesota to start a new life.::Anonymous

After ending his run on Guiding Light, Emmy nominee Michael O'Leary is headed back to TV in the role of a lifetime - as himself. He's hosting the game show "Michael's Amazing Soap _Trivia_ (qv) Challenge" that features his beautiful wife Dilly as his hostess. Taking place on his front porch, three contestants answer challenging question all in their quest to be crowned as SOAP TRIVIA GURU.::Anonymous
